nodes.documentation:
@title Artists burning contract for KnownOrigin (KODA)
* Allows for edition artists to burn unsold works or reduce the supply of sold tokens from editions
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
* BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.
nodes.name: ArtistEditionBurner

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only from the edition artist account"

arguments.value: Only from the edition artist account

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only from the edition artist account"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only when edition not sold out"

arguments.value: Only when edition not sold out

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only when edition not sold out"

nodes.name: deactivateOrReduceEditionSupply

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the KODA address
@dev Only callable from owner
nodes.name: setKodavV2
